description: He gave himself the name Big-D and to my surprise it really did stand for something. He's hung like a Chrysler and he's not shy about showing it off. I leave Big-D to his own devices in this solo after our usual initial chit-chat and give him control. He takes it and runs, giving the camera all it needs to make an informed decision about his abilities and his attributes. He's expressive and it turns out a natural in front of the camera. He's obviously a bit nervous, but somewhere between nervous and confident he pulls off a very fine first solo performance.
title: Big D
